listBibl.bibl: Other than Codrington/Reade No 169 no other copy noted.

handNote.persName: Sayyid 'Abd al-'Aziz gumashtah of Ghulam Muhammad, Mirza-yi Daftar of Mir Asaf Kachahri? of the Exalted Presence

bindingDesc.p: Red leather binding with blind-tooled decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: Islamic prescriptions for marriage, under Tipu Sultan.
